mapper.select: SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, book_type, book_summary FROM t_book_info WHERE show_home_page = '1' limit 3
SELECT book_id, book_name FROM t_book_info WHERE is_hot = '1' limit 9
SELECT book_id, book_name, book_type, substring(book_update_time,1,10) as book_update_time FROM t_book_info ORDER BY book_update_time DESC limit 25

SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, book_type, substring(book_create_time,1,10) AS book_create_time, substring(book_update_time,1,10) AS book_update_time, book_summary FROM t_book_info WHERE book_id = #{book_id}

SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, book_type, CASE WHEN book_type = 0 THEN '其他' WHEN book_type = 1 THEN '玄幻魔法' WHEN book_type = 2 THEN '武侠修真' WHEN book_type = 3 THEN '都市言情' WHEN book_type = 4 THEN '历史军事' WHEN book_type = 5 THEN '侦探推理' WHEN book_type = 6 THEN '网游动漫' WHEN book_type = 7 THEN '科幻小说' WHEN book_type = 8 THEN '恐怖灵异' WHEN book_type = 9 THEN '散文诗词' END AS type_name, substring(book_create_time,1,10) AS book_create_time, substring(book_update_time,1,10) AS book_update_time, book_summary, ( SELECT MIN(chapter_id) AS chapter_id FROM t_book_chapter WHERE book_id = #{book_id}) AS chapter_id FROM t_book_info T1 WHERE T1.book_id = #{book_id}
SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, book_summary FROM t_book_info WHERE book_type = #{book_type} ORDER BY read_count DESC, book_update_time DESC limit #{start},20
SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, book_summary FROM t_book_info WHERE book_is_over = #{bookIsOver} ORDER BY read_count DESC, book_update_time DESC limit #{start},20
SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, book_summary FROM t_book_info WHERE book_name LIKE '%${search}%' OR book_auth LIKE '%${search}%' order by read_count DESC,book_update_time DESC limit #{start},20
SELECT count(*) FROM t_book_info WHERE book_name LIKE '%${search}%' OR book_auth LIKE '%${search}%'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_book_info SET read_day_count = read_day_count + 1 , read_week_count = read_week_count +1, read_month_count = read_month_count +1 , read_count = read_count +1 WHERE book_id = #{book_id}
mapper.select: SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, read_day_count as read_count FROM t_book_info ORDER BY read_day_count DESC limit 10
SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, read_week_count as read_count FROM t_book_info ORDER BY read_week_count DESC limit 10
SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, read_month_count as read_count FROM t_book_info ORDER BY read_month_count DESC limit 10
SELECT book_id, book_name, book_auth, read_count as read_count FROM t_book_info ORDER BY read_count DESC limit 10
